value.title: Facebook developing machine learning chip - The Information
value.excerpt: Facebook Inc is developing a machine learning chip to handle tasks such as content recommendation to users, The Information reported on Thursday, citing two people familiar with the project.

value.title: Singapore Tech Startup ADVANCE.AI Snags $200M in Funding Round

value.title: City of Pittsburgh, PA Goes Live on CSS IMPACT’s Financial Ecosystems Cloud as its Business Tax Management Platform
value.excerpt: On September 1st, 2021, the City of Pittsburgh Pennsylvania, Department of Finance, officially launched CSS IMPACT Financial Cloud as their new Enterprise Business Tax Management Financial Ecosystem.

value.title: Chinese activist Ai Weiwei says Credit Suisse closing his foundation's bank account
value.excerpt: Chinese dissident and artist Ai Weiwei has said Credit Suisse told him it was closing his foundation's bank account in Switzerland earlier this year citing his "criminal record" in China, despite the activist never being convicted of a crime.

value.title: ETF Industry Vet Sharon French Joins Fintech Platform, TIFIN
value.excerpt: In a move that underscores the increasing importance of distribution in the ETF industry, financial industry veteran Sharon French recently joined emerging ETF and mutual fund platform TIFIN. TIFIN is a fintech platform designed to assist asset managers with their digital distribution strategy via artificial intelligence and machine learning software.
